subject: I know that you will be surpri
body:
I know that you will be surprised to receive this mail from me today.
My name is Lynne Scott This letter is highly privileged and it
requires your immediate attention because 
we lost one of our Bank
customers who happens to be from your country also has the same family
name as you 
and he had a fixed-term Deposit worth of $4.7 Million with
our Bank before his death.
Contact me through this email address;
Email; 
upsdeliverycompany@gmx.com
Name; Lynne Scott
Given to your nationality with our late Customer Michael.
 I know you
may not actually be in any way related to him but for you sharing the
same name with him will make it easy to get the funds to your name 
and
both of us will divide the funds 50% 50% once the money is transferred
into your account.
I look forward to your immediate response.
Kind Regards,
Lynne Scott

subject: Re: I know that you will be surpri
body:
Hello Lynne Scott,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, receiving this email has indeed surprised me. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your bank customer. However, I must clarify that I am not related to him in any way, despite sharing the same family name.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did you come across my name? And what exactly is required from me in order to assist with the funds?

I appreciate your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Edward
